DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Agent Transfer Reuse Template Study Activity Repeat Quantity ISO21090.URG.INT.NONNEG.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An administrative activity defined at a global library level that is an action in which an authorized party at a designated study site dispenses or receives a study agent to/from a study subject, though as a defined activity, no actual study subject is identified. EXAMPLE(S): Dispensing a bottle of pills The number of times the activity occurs. NOTE(S): If the frequency is more than once a day, this is still interpreted per time, e.g. BID for 5 days = 10 repeats.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Protocol Agent Transfer Reuse Template Study Activity Repeat Quantity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.:The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._Make or do or perform again.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Protocol Agent Transfer Reuse Template Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.:The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.
The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.
Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Make or do or perform again.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

Concepts.definition: Make or do or perform again.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains URG so that the values are non-negative integers.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
